revised_title: Obituary of Sir Henry John Oram: A Pioneering Naval Engineer
tldr: Sir Henry John Oram was a prominent naval engineer who made significant contributions to the development of naval machinery and technology. He played a crucial role in the adoption of water-tube boilers, steam turbines, and oil fuel in the Royal Navy. Oram's expertise and leadership led to numerous advancements in ship machinery, including electric generators, refrigeration, and auxiliary machines. He was recognized for his achievements and was elected as a Fellow of the Royal Society.
